trans-unit.source: Represents a SOAP binding in a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 表示探索 (Discovery) 文件中的 SOAP 繫結。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP binding is similar to an interface for XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務的介面與相似的 SOAP 繫結。

trans-unit.source: It is useful for versioning and when you look for a XML Web service implementing a specific SOAP binding.
trans-unit.target: 它是適合用來進行版本控制，以及當您查看實作特定的 SOAP 繫結的 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a discovery document might contain optional information about SOAP bindings, which specify the SOAP bindings implemented by referenced Web Servcies.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，探索文件可能包含有關 SOAP 繫結，指定參考的 Web Services 所實作的 SOAP 繫結的選擇性資訊。

trans-unit.source: SOAP bindings are specified within the XML document containd within a discovery document by adding a `SOAP` XML element with an XML namespace equal to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Namespace> constant.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 繫結由探索文件中的 XML 文件 containd 內加入`SOAP`具有相等的 XML 命名空間的 XML 項目<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Namespace>常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Address%2A> property specifies the URL of the XML Web service and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Binding%2A> property specifies the SOAP binding implemented by that XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Address%2A>屬性指定的 XML Web 服務 URL 和<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Binding%2A>屬性會指定該 XML Web 服務所實作的 SOAP 繫結。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service implementing the SOAP binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定實作 SOAP 繫結之 XML Web Service 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the XML Web service implementing the SOAP binding.
trans-unit.target: XML Web Service 的 URL，實作 SOAP 繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML qualified name of the SOAP binding implemented by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 所實作之 SOAP 繫結的 XML 限定名稱 (Qualified Name)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> of the SOAP binding implemented by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，由 XML Web Service 所實作。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the element that specifies a SOAP binding within a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 指定探索文件中 SOAP 繫結之項目的 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: SOAP bindings within a discovery document reside within a `SOAP` XML element, which is a member of the XML namespace specifed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Namespace> constant.
trans-unit.target: 探索文件中的 SOAP 繫結位於`SOAP`XML 項目，也就是 XML 命名空間指定的成員所<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding.Namespace>常數。
